question:
Who among the following were associated with the Ghadar Party?
1. Bhai Parmanand
2. Lala Har Dayal
3. Tarak Nath Das
4. Abdul Barakatullah
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Ghadar party was founded in 1913. Sohan Singh Bhakna was the founding president of the Ghadar Party. The name of the important members of this organization are Bhai Parmanand, Rashbehari Bose, Bhagwan Singh Gyanee, Tarak Nath Das, Lala Har Dayal, Kartar Singh Sarabha, Abdul Hafiz Mohamed Barakatullah.
